value.value:
IF NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.SCHEMATA
    WHERE SCHEMA_NAME = '@{variables('schema_name')}'
)
BEGIN
    EXEC ('CREATE SCHEMA @{variables('schema_name')}')
END

IF NOT EXISTS(
    SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats
    WHERE name = 'dna_adventureworks_parquet'
)
BEGIN
    CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT dna_adventureworks_parquet
    WITH
    (
        FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
        DATA_COMPRESSION='org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
    )
END

scripts.text:
DECLARE  @Address_Command NVARCHAR(MAX)
SET @Address_Command = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [AdventureWorks].[Address] AS
SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''Address.csv'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''adventureworks_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'', 
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='','', 
        FIRST_ROW = 2,
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    )
WITH(
    AddressID INT,
    AddressLine1 NVARCHAR(4000),
    AddressLine2 NVARCHAR(4000),
    City NVARCHAR(4000),
    StateProvince NVARCHAR(4000),
    CountryRegion NVARCHAR(4000),
    PostalCode NVARCHAR(4000),
    rowguid UNIQUEIDENTIFIER,
    ModifiedDate DATETIME2
) AS A'
EXEC sp_executesql @Address_Command

DECLARE @Customer_Command NVARCHAR(MAX)
SET @Customer_Command = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [AdventureWorks].[Customer] AS
SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''Customer.csv'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''adventureworks_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'', 
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='','', 
        FIRST_ROW = 2,
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    )
WITH(
    CustomerID INT,
    NameStyle BIT,
    Title NVARCHAR(4000),
    FirstName NVARCHAR(4000),
    MiddleName NVARCHAR(4000),
    LastName NVARCHAR(4000),
    Suffix NVARCHAR(4000),
    CompanyName NVARCHAR(4000),
    SalesPerson NVARCHAR(4000),
    EmailAddress NVARCHAR(4000),
    Phone NVARCHAR(4000),
    PasswordHash VARCHAR(4000),
    PasswordSalt VARCHAR(4000),
    rowguid UNIQUEIDENTIFIER,
    ModifiedDate DATETIME2
) AS A'
EXEC sp_executesql @Customer_Command

DECLARE @CustomerAddress_Command NVARCHAR(MAX)
SET @CustomerAddress_Command = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [AdventureWorks].[CustomerAddress] AS
SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''CustomerAddress.csv'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''adventureworks_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'', 
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='','', 
        FIRST_ROW = 2,
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    )
WITH(
    CustomerID INT,
    AddressID INT,
    AddressType NVARCHAR(4000),
    rowguid UNIQUEIDENTIFIER,
    ModifiedDate DATETIME2
) AS A'
EXEC sp_executesql @CustomerAddress_Command

DECLARE @Product_Command NVARCHAR(MAX)
SET @Product_Command = N'
CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [AdventureWorks].[Product] AS
SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''Product.csv'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''adventureworks_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'', 
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='','', 
        FIRST_ROW = 2,
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    )
WITH(
    ProductID INT,
    Name NVARCHAR(4000),
    ProductNumber NVARCHAR(4000),
    Color NVARCHAR(4000),
    StandardCost MONEY,
    ListPrice MONEY,
    Size NVARCHAR(4000),
    Weight DECIMAL,
    ProductCategoryID INT,
    ProductModelID INT,
    SellStartDate DATETIME2,
    SellEndDate DATETIME2,
    DiscontinuedDate DATETIME2,
    ThumbNailPhoto VARCHAR(MAX),
    ThumbnailPhotoFileName NVARCHAR(4000),
    rowguid UNIQUEIDENTIFIER,
    ModifiedDate DATETIME2
) AS A'
EXEC sp_executesql @Product_Command

DECLARE @ProductCategory_Command NVARCHAR(MAX)
SET @ProductCategory_Command = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [AdventureWorks].[ProductCategory] AS
SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''ProductCategory.csv'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''adventureworks_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'', 
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='','', 
        FIRST_ROW = 2,
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    )
WITH(
    ProductCategoryID INT,
    ParentProductCategoryID INT,
    Name NVARCHAR(4000),
    rowguid UNIQUEIDENTIFIER,
    ModifiedDate DATETIME2
) AS A'
EXEC sp_executesql @ProductCategory_Command


DECLARE @ProductDescription_Command NVARCHAR(MAX)
SET @ProductDescription_Command = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [AdventureWorks].[ProductDescription] AS
SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(

        DATA_SOURCE = ''adventureworks_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'', 
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='','', 
        FIRST_ROW = 2,
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    )
WITH(
    ProductDescriptionID INT,
    Description NVARCHAR(4000),
    rowguid UNIQUEIDENTIFIER,
    ModifiedDate DATETIME2
) AS A'
EXEC sp_executesql @ProductDescription_Command

DECLARE @ProductModel_Command NVARCHAR(MAX)
SET @ProductModel_Command = N'
CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [AdventureWorks].[ProductModel] 
AS 
SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''ProductModel.csv'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''adventureworks_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'', 
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='','', 
        FIRST_ROW = 2,
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    )
WITH(
    ProductModelID INT,
    Name NVARCHAR(4000),
    CatalogDescription XML,
    rowguid UNIQUEIDENTIFIER,
    ModifiedDate DATETIME2
) AS A'
EXEC sp_executesql @ProductModel_Command

DECLARE @ProductModelProductDescription_Command NVARCHAR(MAX)
SET @ProductModelProductDescription_Command = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [AdventureWorks].[ProductModelProductDescription] 
AS 
SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''ProductModelProductDescription.csv'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''adventureworks_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'', 
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='','', 
        FIRST_ROW = 2,
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    )
WITH(
    ProductModelID INT,
    ProductDescriptionID INT,
    Culture NCHAR(4000),
    rowguid UNIQUEIDENTIFIER,
    ModifiedDate DATETIME2
    ) AS A'
EXEC sp_executesql @ProductModelProductDescription_Command

DECLARE @SalesOrderDetail_Command NVARCHAR(MAX)
SET @SalesOrderDetail_Command = N'
CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [AdventureWorks].[SalesOrderDetail] 
AS 
SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''SalesOrderDetail.csv'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''adventureworks_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'', 
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '','', 
        FIRST_ROW = 2,
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    )
WITH(
    SalesOrderID INT,
    SalesOrderDetailID INT,
    OrderQty SMALLINT,
    ProductID INT,
    UnitPrice MONEY,
    UnitPriceDiscount MONEY,
    LineTotal NUMERIC,
    rowguid UNIQUEIDENTIFIER,
    ModifiedDate DATETIME2
) AS A'
EXEC sp_executesql @SalesOrderDetail_Command

DECLARE @SalesOrderHeader_Command NVARCHAR(MAX)
SET @SalesOrderHeader_Command = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [AdventureWorks].[SalesOrderHeader] 
AS 
SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''SalesOrderHeader.csv'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''adventureworks_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'', 
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='','', 
        FIRST_ROW = 2,
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    )
WITH(
    SalesOrderID INT,
    RevisionNumber TINYINT,
    OrderDate DATETIME2,
    DueDate DATETIME2,
    ShipDate DATETIME2,
    Status TINYINT,
    OnlineOrderFlag BIT,
    SalesOrderNumber NVARCHAR(4000),
    PurchaseOrderNumber NVARCHAR(4000),
    AccountNumber NVARCHAR(4000),
    CustomerID INT,
    ShipToAddressID INT,
    BillToAddressID INT,
    ShipMethod NVARCHAR(4000),
    CreditCardApprovalCode VARCHAR(4000),
    SubTotal MONEY,
    TaxAmt MONEY,
    Freight MONEY,
    TotalDue MONEY,
    Comment NVARCHAR(4000),
    rowguid UNIQUEIDENTIFIER,
    ModifiedDate DATETIME2
) AS A'
EXEC sp_executesql @SalesOrderHeader_Command

DECLARE @vGetAllCategories_Command NVARCHAR(MAX)
SET @vGetAllCategories_Command = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [AdventureWorks].[vGetAllCategories] 
AS 
SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''vGetAllCategories.csv'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''adventureworks_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'', 
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='','', 
        FIRST_ROW = 2,
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    )
WITH(
    ParentProductCategoryName NVARCHAR(4000),
    ProductCategoryName NVARCHAR(4000),
    ProductCategoryID INT
) AS A'
EXEC sp_executesql @vGetAllCategories_Command

DECLARE @vProductAndDescription_Command NVARCHAR(MAX)
SET @vProductAndDescription_Command = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [AdventureWorks].[vProductAndDescription] 
AS 
SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''vProductAndDescription.csv'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''adventureworks_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'', 
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='','', 
        FIRST_ROW = 2,
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    )
WITH(
    ProductID INT,
    Name NVARCHAR(4000),
    ProductModel NVARCHAR(4000),
    Culture NCHAR(4000),
    Description NVARCHAR(4000)
) AS A'
EXEC sp_executesql @vProductAndDescription_Command

DECLARE @vProductModelCatalogDescription_Command NVARCHAR(MAX)
SET @vProductModelCatalogDescription_Command = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [AdventureWorks].[vProductModelCatalogDescription] 
AS 
SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''vProductModelCatalogDescription.csv'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''adventureworks_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'', 
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='','', 
        FIRST_ROW = 2,
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    )
WITH(
    ProductModelID INT,
    Name NVARCHAR(4000),
    Summary NVARCHAR(4000),
    Manufacturer NVARCHAR(4000),
    Copyright NVARCHAR(4000),
    ProductURL NVARCHAR(4000),
    WarrantyPeriod NVARCHAR(4000),
    WarrantyDescription NVARCHAR(4000),
    NoOfYears NVARCHAR(4000),
    MaintenanceDescription NVARCHAR(4000),
    Wheel NVARCHAR(4000),
    Saddle NVARCHAR(4000),
    Pedal NVARCHAR(4000),
    BikeFrame NVARCHAR(4000),
    Crankset NVARCHAR(4000),
    PictureAngle NVARCHAR(4000),
    PictureSize NVARCHAR(4000),
    ProductPhotoID NVARCHAR(4000),
    Material NVARCHAR(4000),
    Color NVARCHAR(4000),
    ProductLine NVARCHAR(4000),
    Style NVARCHAR(4000),
    RiderExperience NVARCHAR(4000),
    rowguid UNIQUEIDENTIFIER,
    ModifiedDate DATETIME2
) AS A'
EXEC sp_executesql @vProductModelCatalogDescription_Command

DECLARE @Address_Command NVARCHAR(MAX)
SET @Address_Command = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW AdventureWorks.Address AS 
SELECT * 
FROM
OPENROWSET
(
    BULK ''Address.parquet'',
    FORMAT=''PARQUET'',
    DATA_SOURCE=''adventureworks_refined''
) AS A'
EXEC sp_executesql @Address_Command
